text: Błażejów () is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Lubawka, within Kamienna Góra County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south-western Poland. It lies approximately south-east of Lubawka, south of Kamienna Góra, and south-west of the regional capital Wrocław. ==References== Category:Villages in Kamienna Góra County
title: Błażejów
